Html:
Is there any place where I can get some consultant help for a project? It is a SL4, Prism 4 application and I need about 4-5 hours of consultation time to determine the best architecture to use for thsi problem.

If you can help or know where i can get help, please let me know

 

thanks!

Please contact Brian Noyes at:  @briannoyes on Twitter.  He is an outstanding Prism consultant.

I think he is at Microsoft BUILD this week so his response maybe delayed.

Have a great day,

Karl
